root.name: Driller
root.description: Driller was a game for 8 bit computers, that was the first to use 3D graphics. The game rendered a solid (untextured) 3D landscape, but was only able to do at a very low frame rate, so the gameplay was mostly puzzle in nature. It was still an impressive experience for players used to wireframe or sprite based games.
